custom-action.name: queue_-_receive
custom-action.description:
Receives a message from a queue. Waits until the message is received.
Possible parameters are: - queue (required): The JNDI queue name. - timeout (optional): Timeout (in ms) applied to wait a message. 0=none. Default value is "2000". - jmsSelector (optional): The message selector to extract only the message that respect the selector condition. - writeMessageInResponse (optional): Whether or not the response should contain the message. Default value is "true". - failOnTimeout (optional): If set to true, the action fails when timeout is reached. Default value is "true".
